EmailTemplate.description: Consumer Complaint Process Email templates tx
EmailTemplate.name: Consumer Complaint Process Email templates tx
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBS of Texas Request Received: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi ,
Thank you for submission.
We have received your Provider Data correction request and the assigned case number is {!Case.CaseNumber}.
You will be notified when your request has been processed.
Sincerely, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Texas.
For Internal Purpose only. (NOTE: Please do not remove the Ref id) Ref id {!Case.Thread_Id}
